extendedInfo.description: Release notes 1.1.5 April 28 2011Corrected problem with incorrect location names.Improved GPS accuracy and battery conservation.Force Close fixes and other bugs fixed. Added more caching to reduce network usage where appropriate.-------------------------------------------If you have any questions or issues with My-Cast, please don't hesitate to email us at mobile-support@digitalcyclone.com-The My-Cast Team==================Release notes for 1.1.4 April 08 2011Fix for notification bar not staying shut off for some usersMinor update to location services, zipcodesGeneral optimizations and bug fixesThanks again to our users for the feedback!---------------------Release notes for version 1.1.2 April 06 2011Fix for notification bar not updating for some users.Fix for widget not updating for some users.Fix for crashes some users were experiencing.Fix for ads not working and connecting (My Cast Lite).General optimizations.My-Cast. Your Weather. No waiting. My-Cast Lite brings you the classic features of our award winning weather app in a totally re-designed Android user experience.Get access to critical weather information wherever you are with My-Cast Lite. View animated radar, clouds, current conditions, hourly and extended forecasts, severe weather alerts and more. Quickly check the weather with an easy-to-interpret graphic display and dynamic weather themes.New functionality includes:â¢ My-Cast Lite dashboard allows you to quickly view your favorite features in one glanceâ¢ Current conditions include a 24 hour trend line of observed conditionsâ¢ Current condition displays in status bar and notification areaâ¢ Forecast conditions including hour by hour, detailed daily descriptionâ¢ Interactive forecast graph allows you to visualize seven different types of weather data for the next 7 daysâ¢ Complete redesign of severe weather alert functionality, including main page event notification and full interactive text descriptionâ¢ Full screen landscape displays for maps and graphsâ¢ Full support for pinch-zoom gestures in all mapsâ¢ Ability to change app skin color for personalized look and feelâ¢ Theme graphics to display current weather conditions

reviews.comment: Awesome. Very reliable, versatile and powerful weather app on the web
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Droid Weather App
reviews.comment: High quality app, worldwide mapping, accurate \"follow-me\" GPS plotting, beuatifully presented. Fast and responsive. Highly recommended
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great App Been using for years. Easy to navigate,acurate,and good forcast. Use it all the time ride moped never got rained on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice UI, but where in the hell do you get
reviews.comment: your forecasts? They\'re stunningly different from the basic Android weather app\'s, and usually inaccurate. Real-time is fine though, so you get a pass
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: Everytime I tried opening this app it took me to some sort of twitter weather feed. No chance to change options if available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: This has been my fav app since 2002 (before smartphones!)...however lately it\'s sometimes not updating to my current GPS location, even with line of sight. Pls add Celcius/Fahrenheit \'quick toggle\' on current/week/hourly forecast pages so I don\'t have to change in settings. - Motorola RAZR Maxx (ICS)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have 3 different weather apps and they all say that it\'s 39 degrees out. My Cast is telling me that it\'s 27 degrees out, same location setting as the rest. How can My Cast be 12 degrees off? I\'m inclined to believe the other apps are correct, not My Cast. Majority rules.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not accurate
reviews.comment: Needs So Far Today info tho like how much total rain today, the highest/lowest wind gust and so forth. Captivate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: By far the best free weather app. Makes the others look like babies\' toys. Currents, radar, forecasts, options everything is amazing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice but: no automatic weather alert notification. Daily forecast could be more extend. Webcam integr. would be nice.Stick with weather bug for now !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Always 45 mins behind. Map also behind. Temp always a few degrees off too. Everyone check real thermometer where u are. This apps temp never accurate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app, cleaner ui than weather bug, no option to use only network location. Network loc should be just fine for weather, they dont need my house.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Any chance you can make the widget take up less space? Other than that the app is pretty awesome. Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: By far my fave. Radar better than weather bug. Force closes a lot tho. Samsung Captivate galaxy s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Barb
reviews.comment: Works great! Wish radar would give a closer area view (I.e. city, street view). Loads fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t disable status bar icon
reviews.comment: Takes up status bar space, especially in the pull down menu. I don\'t need one quarter of my screen telling me the current temp. Nice app otherwise, but will probably uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than others
reviews.comment: Helpful and reliable. Good moving radar map. Great layout options.
reviews.author: Brett P

reviews.title: No longer updated
reviews.comment: Used to be my preferred weather app but I now experience a bug every  time I open the app which often results in a force close. Given that it hasn\'t been updated in two years, I\'m not holding out much hope in it being fixed.  Accuweather is a nice alternative.
reviews.author: Will Law

reviews.title: Running into trouble on 4.3
reviews.comment: Map screen and sometimes the whole app freezes in Android 4.3. Last update was years ago. Anybody care?
reviews.author: Gary Henderson
